Key Match Events: Mexico scored three goals in the match
Orbelín Pineda scored the first goal in the 5th minute
César Huerta scored the second goal in the 53rd minute
Luis Romo scored the third goal in the 57th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in sweltering 98-degree heat
The official attendance was reported as 25,271 but the actual crowd seemed much smaller
